meanings.definition: The act of incorporating or the state of being incorporated.
meanings.sent1: The incorporation of new ideas into the project was essential for its success.
meanings.sent2: The incorporation of the new company went smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The incorporation of the surprise party into the busy schedule brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The incorporation of music into the lesson plan made learning more enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: The colorful incorporation of different flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The process of forming a corporation.
meanings.sent1: The incorporation of the business required careful planning and legal steps.
meanings.sent2: The incorporation of the company was completed after obtaining the necessary licenses.
meanings.sent3: The incorporation of the superhero team was a fun exercise in teamwork.
meanings.sent4: The incorporation of the ingredients in the recipe was done with precision.
meanings.sent5: The successful incorporation of the new branch expanded the company's reach.

meanings.definition: The inclusion of something as part of a whole.
meanings.sent1: The incorporation of feedback from customers helped improve the product.
meanings.sent2: The incorporation of the additional features enhanced the functionality of the device.
meanings.sent3: The incorporation of the missing puzzle piece completed the picture.
meanings.sent4: The incorporation of diverse perspectives enriched the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The seamless incorporation of technology into daily life revolutionized communication.
